author: Tom Peters
message: Formula for success: under promise and over deliver.
title: Thought of the day

author: Henri Bergson
message: The eye sees only what the mind is prepared to comprehend.
title: Thought of the day

author: Lee Mildon
message: People seldom notice old clothes if you wear a big smile.
title: Thought of the day

author: Shakti Gawain
message: The more light you allow within you, the brighter the world you live in will be.
title: Thought of the day
